# Welcome to My Blog

This is a personal blog built with wizardry web. Posts are content-addressable, version-tracked, and ready for future Nostr integration.

## Recent Posts

<!-- Post listing will be generated by blog-index CGI -->
<div id="post-list" hx-get="/cgi/blog-index" hx-trigger="load" hx-swap="innerHTML">
  Loading posts...
</div>

---

## About This Blog

This blog uses:
- **Content-addressable posts**: Each post has a unique hash-based ID
- **Version tracking**: Edits create new versions linked to originals
- **Tag-based navigation**: Browse posts by topic
- **UNIX permissions**: Visibility controlled by filesystem

Built with [wizardry web](https://github.com/andersaamodt/wizardry) - honest web pages backed by POSIX shell scripts.
